channel.title: Lich King's Helmet
channel.description:
Was bored, modeled in max and sculpted in Zbrush. [img]http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2011/044/2/9/lich_king_helmet_by_frell262-d39haee.jpg[/img]
This wasn't totally done, but this had the sort of look I wanted to continue with and make the entire armor set down to the waist for a cinematic sort of shot. But instead I stopped after the helmet to start on an Oblivion archer style character.
This section hasn't been laid in a while so ye

item.title: Lich King's Helmet
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

the skull near the top would really flaunt the wielders homosexual tendencies.

Read full topic

item.title: Lich King's Helmet
item.dc:creator: @Timberpig1 Timberpig.
item.description:
@Timberpig1 wrote:

i’ve seen quite a few different versions of this, this one is definitely one of the better ones haha so how much was the original model before you imported to zbrush? i dont know how much detail to put into the base mesh

Read full topic

item.title: Lich King's Helmet
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Is that off the dude that sits at the frozen throne or something? Forgot his name.
Edit: yeah this dude http://www.scenicreflections.com/files/WOW:_The_Frozen_Throne_Wallpaper_59ikn.jpg

Looks good.

Read full topic

item.description:

Yea, not really a full time player though. I really just like blizzards art style

I never had you down as a Warcraft fan.
